column1: Your request has been received. We will respond to you as soon as possible.
column2: Beiðnin þín hefur verið móttekin. Við munum svara þér eins fljótt og mögulegt er.

column1: Discount amount is exceeded, b2b discount is lowered to maximum allowed value
column2: Afsláttur er kominn fram yfir leyfileg mörk, fyrirtækjaafsláttur er stilltur á hámarksafslátt.

column1: NOTE! The final invoice is issued when the order has been shipped.
column2: ATH! Heildarreikningur er gefinn út þegar pöntun er komin í flutning.
